# Later Jin invasion of Joseon

| strength3         =
| casualties1       = 10,000
| casualties2       = 3,000
| casualties3       =
| notes             =
}}
|
rr=Jeongmyo-Horan|
mr=Chŏngmyo-Horan|
|title=Korean name}}
The Later Jin invasion of Joseon occurred in early 1627 when the Later Jin prince Amin led an invasion of the Joseon dynasty. The war ended after three months with the Later Jin establishing itself as sovereign tributary overlord over Joseon.|Yuan Chonghuan}}

* History of Korea
* Korean-Jurchen wars
